biotools.summary: CEllular Niche Association (CENA) is a method for a joint identification of pairwise association together with the particular subset of cells in which the association is detected. In this implementation, CENA is limited to associations between the genes' expression levels (data from scRNA-sequencing) and an additional cellular meta-data of choice.
